item.description:
Some Nightmare on Main Street Members will be attending their
25th Reunion.

For Details go to

A.

http://www.monsterman...

www.monstermania.net/Convention_Hartford_CT.htm

It starts earlier, but I do not think that I can
Get there before 1:00.


B)

http://slasherclub.co...

slasherclub.com/board/index.php?topic=178.0

C)

http://conventionfans...

conventionfans.today.com/2009/03/27/convention-profile-monster-mania-horror-convention-2009/

I have worked in Middletown and East Harford in the past.

Even when I worked in East Harford, some times to avoid the I - 91
Traffic jams I would drive from East Hartford to where this
Hotel is to hop onto I - 91.
So I have driven around this area a few thousands times over the years.

Wonder if there will be a showing of "My Name is Bruce"
Since Bruce Campbell is scheduled to be there?

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Maribeth & I are going. I will contact anyone else who RSVPs Yes & Maybe.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone attends Monster Mania Con on June 13
